adrFormatAddress: 4 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Adi Katz is one of the best gynecologists ever. She is very professional, thorough, and caring. She knows her stuff and always provide the best advice for your condition. I’m happy that I was referred to this wonderful doctor.

text.text: Dr. Adi Katz is one of the best gynecologists ever. She is very professional, thorough, and caring. She knows her stuff and always provide the best advice for your condition. I’m happy that I was referred to this wonderful doctor.

originalText.text: I'm so happy I was referred to Dr Katz to have my laparoscopy surgery done. She is very knowledgeable and patient , she explained everything for my pre and post surgery. I cannot emphasize how much of a great person she is. I was so comfortable with her and the staff at West 58th street, everyone was so welcoming .I will recommend anyone to visit her don't hesitate call today and make that appointment .

text.text: I'm so happy I was referred to Dr Katz to have my laparoscopy surgery done. She is very knowledgeable and patient , she explained everything for my pre and post surgery. I cannot emphasize how much of a great person she is. I was so comfortable with her and the staff at West 58th street, everyone was so welcoming .I will recommend anyone to visit her don't hesitate call today and make that appointment .

originalText.text:
I wrote a one star review before (I don't know how to reply it), but want to amend to it: seeing my one star review, Dr. Katz called to talk about the situation (my experience with the surgery coordinator). This made me feel much better!  And well, it took a week but I finally got a reply from the surgery coordinator about my questions.

I'm a single working parent of a very young child without family in the US, so organizing this surgery has been stressful - which increased my anxiety. I am feeling much better about it, but a more responsive surgery coordinator would help a lot in future interactions.

originalText.text:
Dr. Katz wonderful surgeon, she give you all options on your health.  She also let you know in where you can understand and just in medical terms.  I can't say enough about her staff.  They are just wonderful , from the time you speak to them on the phone to make appointment,
to the time you step into the office.  onthetheappointment

originalText.text: Dr katz is by far one of the best physicians I have encountered. She has an excellent bedside manner, she is thorough and just overall great!
